revised_title: Investigating the Viscosity and Loss of Energy in Metals
tldr: The author investigates the influence of stress and strain on the physical properties of matter, focusing on the viscosity of metals and the loss of energy in torsionally vibrating wires. The study reveals that the loss of energy is independent of the amplitude and is inversely proportional to the vibration period. The findings also show that the loss of energy is affected by factors such as temperature, fatigue of elasticity, and magnetic properties of the metals.
